types.description: Details of a content script registered programmatically

css.description: The list of CSS files to inject

js.description: The list of JS files to inject

allFrames.description: If allFrames is true, implies that the JavaScript or CSS should be injected into all frames of current page. By default, it's false and is only injected into the top frame.

matchAboutBlank.description: If matchAboutBlank is true, then the code is also injected in about:blank and about:srcdoc frames if your extension has access to its parent document. Ignored if matchOriginAsFallback is specified. By default it is false.

matchOriginAsFallback.description: If matchOriginAsFallback is true, then the code is also injected in about:, data:, blob: when their origin matches the pattern in 'matches', even if the actual document origin is opaque (due to the use of CSP sandbox or iframe sandbox). Match patterns in 'matches' must specify a wildcard path glob. By default it is false.

runAt.description: The soonest that the JavaScript or CSS will be injected into the tab. Defaults to "document_idle".

world.description: The JavaScript world for a script to execute within. Defaults to "ISOLATED".

cookieStoreId.description: limit the set of matched tabs to those that belong to the given cookie store id

types.description: An object that represents a content script registered programmatically

functions.name: unregister
functions.description: Unregister a content script registered programmatically
